# Pull Request

Thanks for contributing to ThoughtsPlus! Please fill out this template to help us review quickly.

## Summary
- What does this change do?
- Why is it needed?

## Related issues
- Closes #
- Related #

## Testing
- [ ] `npx tsc --noEmit`
- [ ] `npm test`
- [ ] Not run (explain):

## Screenshots / recordings
Required for UI changes. Please include before/after if possible.

## Checklist
- [ ] I kept this PR focused and scoped
- [ ] I updated docs or comments where needed
- [ ] I did not include secrets or API keys
- [ ] I verified dev mode data isolation (no production data overwrite)
